channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Office seating in park, 10th November
item.description:
Lots of random office chairs have been collected in the park, being used for street drinking and drug taking. Need to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brixton Hill, Streatham Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Black bag dumped on pavement by alleyway entrance on ethelbert street
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ethelbert Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Bags of clothes everywhere, 10th November
item.description:
Bags of clothes left at unemptied clothes bin now spread all across pavement and road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blenheim Gardens, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 10th November
item.description:
Hackney installed new bins, and these are now being used as a platform for graffiti. Hackney put up scaffolding weeks ago, and this is also being used as a platform for graffiti. One year ago this wall was completely free of graffiti. Please remove.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pownall Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fully drains, 10th November
item.description:
You need to send someone from your highways section to inspect & make a job order to sort out the gully drains on East Dulwich road that runs from the church. How do you expect water to run uphill and into the gully drains as the concrete slabs near them have sunk over the years?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 96, East Dulwich Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox on road, 10th November
item.description:
There is a dead fox lying on the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birkdale Road, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: No street cleaning on Buckingham Road Nos 3-25, 10th November
item.description:
Although I regularly see a street cleaner on the other side of the road (Kingsgate estate) no one seems to have been sweeping the litter and leaves on our side of the road for sometime.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Buckingham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellenden Road, London

item.title: Tree may fall, 10th November
item.description:
The tree trunk is split nearly all the way through. At risk of breaking and falling on road causing hazard. Highfield Drive is a cul de sac with the primary school at the end with a lot of traffic and pedestrians during school run hours - this tree falling could result in serious injury if it fell during this time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2a, Highfield Drive, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More or less where indicated opposite number 57, 10th November
item.description:
There are two potholes here which I have previously reported several times I understand that the one on the right may still not be deep enough for repair although is very wide. The one on the left has got deeper. So, please could you ask the guys to take another look at both of these long-standing potholes. Many thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
